greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of not necessarily connected 4-regular simple graphs on n vertices with girth at least 4.
link: Jason Kimberley, Not necessarily connected k-regular graphs with girth at least 4
Jason Kimberley, Index of sequences counting not necessarily connected k-regular simple graphs with girth at least g
formula: This sequence is the Euler transformation of A033886.
mathematica: EulerTransform[Rest @ A033886] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 04 2019, updated Mar 18 2020 *)
xref: 4-regular simple graphs with girth at least 4: A033886 (connected), A185244 (disconnected), this sequence (not necessarily connected).

Not necessarily connected k-regular simple graphs with girth at least 4: A185314 (any k), A185304 (triangle); specified degree k: A008484 (k=2), A185334 (k=3), this sequence (k=4), A185354 (k=5), A185364 (k=6).
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 03 2011
